Name: Scorphius
About the game: You are an Adventurer who have survived the plague. You struggle to gain power that will take you deep into the dungeons and high up into the heavens to put an end to all that is wrong in this world. Created by Indie developer, Scorphius is an online Adventure RPG set in a dark fantasy world. The focus is on the adventure, combat and powerful items and Hives of Minds passive skills which allows character customization. Scorphius will never be pay-to-win game. Key Features Survive & Adventure You have survived the plague and now its time to put an end to it. This is a classless game. Character Customization Customize the character when creating the Avatar and during gameplay with combinations from itemized drops and Hives of Minds Passive skill Tree. Never Pay-To-Win. This game will never be Pay-To-Win. Competitive Play. Fight other players in PvP areas, or PvP activated zones. You can flag yourself on equipping PvP flag items which drops after killing monsters. You will then engage in a brutal combat with any player anywhere in the Scorpion World.
